long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shorts Guard - Enhance Your YouTube Experience
Are you tired of endless YouTube Shorts disrupting your browsing experience? Introducing Shorts Guard, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube experience by hiding all Shorts content, allowing you to focus on the videos that matter most to you.

Features:
Seamless Integration: Easily integrates with your existing YouTube interface without any complicated setup.
Distraction-Free Browsing: Automatically hides all YouTube Shorts from your feed, helping you stay focused on longer, more substantial content.
Customizable Settings: Toggle the hiding feature on or off with a simple click, giving you full control over your viewing experience.
Lightweight and Fast: Designed to be lightweight and efficient, ensuring no impact on your browser’s performance.
Regular Updates: We continuously update our extension to keep up with YouTube’s changes and improve functionality.
Why Choose YouTube Shorts Blocker?
Enhanced Productivity: Remove distractions and enjoy a more focused YouTube experience.
User-Friendly: No technical knowledge required. Install and start using it in seconds.
Privacy-Focused: We respect your privacy. No personal data is collected or shared.
How It Works:
Install the Extension: Download YouTube Shorts Blocker from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate the Extension: With a single click, activate the extension to start hiding Shorts content.
Enjoy: Browse YouTube as usual, without the clutter of Shorts.
Join Thousands of Satisfied Users
Experience YouTube the way it was meant to be—clean, focused, and distraction-free. Join thousands of satisfied users who have already transformed their YouTube experience with YouTube Shorts Blocker.
